headline: How & Why SpaceX is Moving the AI Data Center Race to Space
summary: Elon Musk's broad business empire is reaching a critical tipping point. The recently combined SpaceX/xAI entity will make the countless synergies that much more powerful.

headline: Microchip to Report Q3 Earnings: What's in Store for the Stock?

headline: Amtech Systems to Report Q1 Earnings: What's in Store for the Stock?
summary: ASYS heads into Q1 with AI-driven packaging demand and cost cuts as tailwinds, though weak mature-node markets cloud near-term growth.

headline: New Power Module Enhances AI Data Center Power Density and Efficiency
summary: Microchip’s MCPF1525 power module with PMBus™ delivers 25A DC-DC power, stackable up to 200ACHANDLER, Ariz., Feb. 03, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The increasing AI and high-performance computing workloads demand power solutions that combine efficiency, reliability and scalability. Integrated power modules help streamline design, reduce energy use and deliver the stable performance required for advanced data centers.
